[Global Namespace]

Global namespace.

Types
SCRIPTSTATE
enum SCRIPTSTATE {...}

The state of a monster's script.

Values
SCRIPT_PLAYING

(0) Playing the sequence

SCRIPT_WAIT

(1) Waiting on everyone in the script to be ready

SCRIPT_CLEANUP

(2) Cancelling the script / cleaning up

SCRIPT_WALK_TO_MARK

(3) Walk to mark

SCRIPT_RUN_TO_MARK

(4) Run to mark
